android-cloexec-pipe.description:
Description

This check detects usage of
pipe()
. Using
pipe()
is not recommended,
pipe2()
is the suggested replacement. The check also adds the
O_CLOEXEC
flag that marks the file descriptor to be closed in child processes.
Without this flag a sensitive file descriptor can be leaked to a
child process, potentially into a lower-privileged SELinux domain.

Examples:

pipe
(
pipefd
);

Suggested replacement:

pipe2
(
pipefd
,
O_CLOEXEC
);
android-cloexec-pipe.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
